attributes.action: to deploy the full state apparatus in hunting down and eradicating pedophiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lets take the fight to the pedophiles and get the gloves off employing the full state apparatus SIS, MI5, MOD, British Army, Royal AirForce, Royal Navy, SOCA, Police and NOMS lets show them we mean buisness and eradicated those who destroy lives, communities and families.
Lets do it for Queen and Country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
